title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Maker Space-Based Social Studies Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience

learning_goals: Develop one instructional design proposal for social studies topics (e.g., local problem-solving) using maker space tools
